pages.name: Pigman
pages.text: Along with the piglins, there are also pigmen, Intelligent humanoid pigs which are also formidable warriors.
Pigmen primarily dwell in the sky dimension, and they also have established a small nomadic population in the overworld, primarily in caves.

pages.name: Zombie Pigman
pages.text: The zombified version of the pigman, it lives in all the nether biomes.
